user.title: Select Authentication Method

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate SmartThings
reauth_confirm.description: The SmartThings integration needs to be reauthenticated. Please confirm to continue.

reauth_manual.title: Update Access Token
reauth_manual.description: Please enter a new access token to reauthenticate.

pat.title: Enter Personal Access Token
pat.description: Please enter a SmartThings [Personal Access Token]({token_url}) that has been created per the [instructions]({component_url}).  This will be used to create the Home Assistant integration within your SmartThings account.

select_location.title: Select Location
select_location.description: Please select the SmartThings Location you wish to add to Home Assistant.  We will then open a new window and ask you to login and authorize installation of the Home Assistant integration into the selected location.

abort.missing_scopes: The OAuth token is missing required scopes: {scope}
abort.missing_installed_app_id: The OAuth token does not contain an installed app ID.
abort.oauth_error: OAuth authentication failed. Please try again.
abort.no_available_locations: There are no available SmartThings Locations to set up in Home Assistant.

error.invalid_access_token: The access token is invalid or expired.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to SmartThings. Please check your network connection.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error.token_invalid_format: The token must be in the UID/GUID format
error.token_unauthorized: The token is invalid or no longer authorized.
error.token_forbidden: The token does not have the required OAuth scopes.
error.app_setup_error: Unable to set up the SmartApp.  Please try again.
error.webhook_error: SmartThings could not validate the webhook URL. Please ensure the webhook URL is reachable from the internet and try again.

application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) to create OAuth credentials for SmartThings.

1. Go to SmartThings Developer Workspace
2. Create a new app or use an existing one
3. Set the redirect URI to: `{redirect_uri}`
4. Copy the Client ID and Client Secret below
